医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
JUNE Medical 的 Galaxy II® 自固式手术牵开器因其高品质和安全性获得 MDR 认证JUNE Medical 自豪地宣布，其 Galaxy II® 自固式手术牵开器已获得 BSI 集团的医疗器械法规（MDR - 法规 (EU) 2017/745）认证，可在欧盟使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/JUNE-Medicale28099s-Galaxy-IIc2ae-self-retaining-surgical-retractor-receives-MDR-certification-for-its-high-quality-and-safety。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/JUNE-Medicale28099s-Galaxy-IIc2ae-self-retaining-surgical-retractor-receives-MDR-certification-for-its-high-quality-and-safety。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3146f643-e963-43fe-863f-3653395a7b8b Thu, 21 Dec 2023 00:08:00 -0500 JUNE Medical’s Galaxy II® self-retaining surgical retractor receives MDR certification for its high quality and safety
巴西审查探索晚期霍奇金淋巴瘤的新兴疗法2023 年 12 月 12 日，Oncotarget 第 14 卷发表了一篇新的综述论文，题为“巴西难治性或复发性经典霍奇金淋巴瘤治疗的当前观点：平衡疗效、安全性和耐受性”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Brazilian-review-explores-emerging-therapies-for-advanced-Hodgkin-lymphoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Brazilian-review-explores-emerging-therapies-for-advanced-Hodgkin-lymphoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=699898de-91b8-4cb9-89e1-902d7823f4b9 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 20:06:00 -0500 Brazilian review explores emerging therapies for advanced Hodgkin lymphoma
研究指出 senolytic 药物是对抗肺气肿的潜在武器一篇新的研究论文发表在 Aging（被 MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 的“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 23 期，题为“贝尼地平钙通道阻滞剂促进死亡香烟烟雾诱导的衰老细胞并改善肺气肿。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-points-to-senolytic-drugs-as-潜在-weapon-against-lung-emphysema.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-points-to-senolytic-drugs-as-潜在-weapon-against-lung-emphysema.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=827dbcd6-fc59-40f8-8c7b-92de8d49d5ff Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:59:00 -0500 Study points to senolytic drugs as potential weapon against lung emphysema
足球与白质标记以外的更多脑损伤有关与那些不踢足球的人相比，前橄榄球运动员的大脑白质损伤迹象（称为白质高信号）可能与血管危险因素、大脑萎缩和其他痴呆症标志物有更密切的联系，如脑部扫描所示。 ，根据美国神经病学学会医学杂志 Neurology® 在线期刊 2023 年 12 月 20 日发表的一项研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Football-linked-to-more-brain-damage-beyond-white-matter-marks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Football-linked-to-more-brain-damage-beyond-white-matter-marks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30ad3a5a-7ff2-4f88-80ac-0dd4688784f9 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:52:00 -0500 Football linked to more brain damage beyond white matter marks
蛋白质“开关”控制乳腺癌扩散和免疫治疗反应尽管免疫疗法前景广阔，但它无法治疗许多癌症，包括超过 80% 的一些最晚期乳腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Protein-onoff-switch-controls-breast-cancer-spread-and-immunotherapy-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Protein-onoff-switch-controls-breast-cancer-spread-and-immunotherapy-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=541ace31-3b43-455f-8956-7347294c3c09 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:45:00 -0500 Protein "on/off switch" controls breast cancer spread and immunotherapy response
研究揭示无声打嗝对生活质量和心理健康造成的看不见的影响无法打嗝-；称为逆行环咽功能障碍（R-CPD）——是由于喉咙的环咽肌无法放松以允许气体向外通过而引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-reveals-the-unseen-toll-of-silent-burps-on-quality-of-life-and-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-reveals-the-unseen-toll-of-silent-burps-on-quality-of-life-and-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd51370c-7604-4c3e-8b52-85b0a1baa94b Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:42:15 -0500 Study reveals the unseen toll of silent burps on quality of life and mental health
研究将早期失去父母与成人关系中的依恋问题联系起来根据《压力与健康》杂志发表的一项研究，早年失去父母的女性在成年后可能更容易经历与伴侣的分离焦虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-links-early-parental-loss-to-attachment-issues-in-adult-relationships.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-links-early-parental-loss-to-attachment-issues-in-adult-relationships.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=686a6f6e-3e6a-4567-9928-f114bc583584 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:31:18 -0500 Study links early parental loss to attachment issues in adult relationships
较高剂量的外用皮质类固醇会增加骨质疏松和骨折的风险新研究表明，通常用于治疗炎症性皮肤病的外用皮质类固醇剂量较高，与骨质疏松症和骨质疏松症相关骨折的风险升高有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Higher-doses-of-topical-corticosteroids-linked-to-increased-risks-of-osteoporosis-and-bone-fractures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Higher-doses-of-topical-corticosteroids-linked-to-increased-risks-of-osteoporosis-and-bone-fractures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3edcc394-f934-4f2e-8087-7499f30d0d29 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:19:00 -0500 Higher doses of topical corticosteroids linked to increased risks of osteoporosis and bone fractures
清除细胞杂乱：关于细胞如何保持健康的新见解如果我们不定期倒垃圾，我们的家就会变得不愉快，甚至危害我们的健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Clearing-the-cellular-clutter-New-insights-into-how-our-cells-stay-healthy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Clearing-the-cellular-clutter-New-insights-into-how-our-cells-stay-healthy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8512e637-3a48-4730-b5f8-eec9ec24baeb Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:13:43 -0500 Clearing the cellular clutter: New insights into how our cells stay healthy
研究揭示了大脑将经历拼接成记忆的内置机制挪威科技大学卡夫利系统神经科学研究所的科学家们发现了大脑中的一种活动模式，可以作为构建连续体验的模板。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-reveals-brains-built-in-mechanism-for-stitching-experiences-into-memories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-reveals-brains-built-in-mechanism-for-stitching-experiences-into-memories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b574c114-736f-4ab4-919d-e42fd30add57 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:02:23 -0500 Study reveals brain's built-in mechanism for stitching experiences into memories
